author: mmusich
body:
Greetings,
this fixes the cases in which there is a uniform value to be displayed all over the tk map, avoid to generate default images (with irrelevant legend) as in: [here](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/payload_inspector/image_plot/Prod/CMSSW_10_0_X_2017-11-28-%3D)
title: [10.0.x] fix tk map scale in SiStrip PI, in case there is a sigle value to be displayed
